title: Rob Kalin, Founder Of Etsy
teaser: Host Jessica Harris talks with Rob Kalin, founder of the online handmade goods marketplace Etsy. Harris also talks with Lyndon Rive, co-founder of SolarCity.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris talks with Rob Kalin, founder of the online handmade goods marketplace Etsy. Harris also talks with Lyndon Rive, co-founder of SolarCity.
